00020 #include "DotGraphGenerator.h"
00021 #include "brics_3d/core/Logger.h"

00027 DotGraphGenerator::DotGraphGenerator() {
00028         reset();
00029 }
00030 
00031 DotGraphGenerator::~DotGraphGenerator() {
00032         reset();
00033 }
00034 
00035 void DotGraphGenerator::reset() {
00036         alreadyVisitedNodes.clear();
00037         nodes.str("");
00038         edges.str("");
00039         dotGraph.str("");
00040 }
00041 
00042 void DotGraphGenerator::visit(Node* node){
00043         assert (node != 0);
00044 
00045         vector<Node*>::iterator visitedNodes;
00046         visitedNodes = find (alreadyVisitedNodes.begin(), alreadyVisitedNodes.end(), node);
00047 
00048         if (visitedNodes == alreadyVisitedNodes.end()) { // if not in list: insert and handle node
00049                 doHandleNode(node);
00050                 alreadyVisitedNodes.push_back(node);
00051         }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void DotGraphGenerator::visit(Group* node){
00055         assert (node !=0);
00056         doHandleEdges(node); //all edges to children will be processed
00057         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //and feed forward to be handled as node
00058 }
00059 
00060 void DotGraphGenerator::visit(Transform* node){
00061         //this->visit(dynamic_cast<Group*>(node)); //feed forward to be handled as group TODO a diffrent handling?
00062 
00063         assert (node != 0);
00064         doHandleEdges(node);
00065 
00066         vector<Node*>::iterator visitedNodes;
00067         visitedNodes = find (alreadyVisitedNodes.begin(), alreadyVisitedNodes.end(), node);
00068 
00069         if (visitedNodes == alreadyVisitedNodes.end()) { // if not in list: insert and handle node
00070                 doHandleTransform(node);
00071                 alreadyVisitedNodes.push_back(node);
00072         }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DotGraphGenerator::visit(GeometricNode* node){
00076         this->visit(dynamic_cast<Node*>(node)); //just feed forward to be handled as node
00077 }
00078 
00079 void DotGraphGenerator::doHandleNode(Node* node) {
00080         assert (node !=0);
00081 //      LOG(DEBUG) << "Adding node " << node->getId() << " to dot graph.";
00082 
00083         //Each node should add a line like this: 2 [label = "ID [2]\n(name = point_cloud_1)\n"];
00084 
00085         std::stringstream aggregatedAttributes;
00086         vector<Attribute> attributeList = node->getAttributes();
00087         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(attributeList.size()); ++i) {
00088                 aggregatedAttributes << attributeList[i];
00089                 aggregatedAttributes << "\\n";
00090         }
00091 
00092 //      nodes << node->getId() << ";" << std::endl;
00093         nodes << node->getId();
00094     nodes << " [label = \"";
00095     nodes << "ID [" << node->getId() << "]\\n";
00096     nodes << aggregatedAttributes.str();
00097     nodes << "\"]";
00098         nodes << ";" << std::endl;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void DotGraphGenerator::doHandleTransform(Transform* node) {
00102         assert (node !=0);
00103         std::stringstream aggregatedAttributes;
00104         vector<Attribute> attributeList = node->getAttributes();
00105         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(attributeList.size()); ++i) {
00106                 aggregatedAttributes << attributeList[i];
00107                 aggregatedAttributes << "\\n";
00108         }
00109         node->getUpdateCount();
00110         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr currentTransform;
00111         currentTransform = node->getLatestTransform();
00112         const double* matrixPtr = currentTransform->getRawData();
00113         double x = matrixPtr[12];
00114         double y = matrixPtr[13];
00115         double z = matrixPtr[14];
00116 
00117 
00118 //      nodes << node->getId() << ";" << std::endl;
00119         nodes << node->getId();
00120     nodes << " [label = \"";
00121     nodes << "ID [" << node->getId() << "]\\n";
00122     nodes << "T = (" << x << ", " << y <<", " << z << ")\\n";
00123     nodes << "Updates: " << node->getUpdateCount() << "\\n";
00124     nodes << aggregatedAttributes.str();
00125     nodes << "\"";
00126 //    nodes << "style=\"rounded,filled\", shape=diamond";
00127 //    nodes << "shape=circle";
00128     nodes << "style=\"filled\"";
00129     nodes <<"]";
00130         nodes << ";" << std::endl;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void DotGraphGenerator::doHandleEdges(Group* node){
00134         assert (node !=0);
00135 
00136         // An egde has the following format: 3 -> 4;
00137 
00138         for (unsigned int childIndex = 0; childIndex < node->getNumberOfChildren(); ++childIndex) {
00139                 edges << node->getId() << " -> " << (*node->getChild(childIndex)).getId() << ";" << std::endl;
00140         }
00141 }
00142 
00143 std::string DotGraphGenerator::getDotGraph() {
00144         std::string result;
00145 
00146         /* This e.g. would be a valid dot file:
00147          * digraph {
00148          *      1 [label = "ID [1]\n"];
00149          *      2 [label = "ID [2]\n(name = point_cloud_1)\n"];
00150          *      3 [label = "ID [3]\n"];
00151          *      4 [label = "ID [4]\n(name = point_cloud_2)\n"];
00152          *      5 [label = "ID [5]\n(name = point_cloud_reduced)\n(filterType = octree)\n"];
00153          *      6 [label = "ID [6]\n(name = point_cloud_box_roi)\n"];
00154          *      7 [label = "ID [7]\n"];
00155          *      9 [label = "ID [9]\n"];
00156          *      10 [label = "ID [10]\n"];
00157          *      11 [label = "ID [11]\n(name = mesh_1)\n"];
00158          *
00159          *      1 -> 2;
00160          *      1 -> 3;
00161          *      1 -> 5;
00162          *      1 -> 6;
00163          *      1 -> 7;
00164          *      1 -> 11;
00165          *      3 -> 4;
00166          *      7 -> 9;
00167          *      9 -> 10;
00168          *
00169          *      }
00170          */
00171 
00172         dotGraph.str(""); //reset
00173         dotGraph << "digraph {" << std::endl;
00174         dotGraph << nodes.str();
00175         dotGraph << std::endl;
00176         dotGraph << edges.str();
00177         dotGraph << std::endl;
00178         dotGraph << "}" << std::endl;
00179         result = dotGraph.str();
00180         return result;
00181 }
00182 
00183 }
